title: Battle of the Blades S04E00 Made in Canada WS.XviD-err0001
description:
Battle of the Blades S04E00: Made in Canada

Battle of the Blades is a Canadian figure skating reality show and competition that airs on CBC. Conceptually, this series resembles Dancing with the Stars, but in this case, professional figure skaters are paired with well-known hockey players.

If you are a fan of figure skating, ice hockey or Dancing With The Stars, this show is worth a try.

This episode looks back at the unlikely creation of this show and highlights the personalities and performances of skaters from the first three seasons. The content is surprisingly emotional; I was in tears a few times. 

The 16 skaters for season 4 are each briefly introduced. This season, the pairs of figure skaters, hockey players will be: 

- Oksana Kazakova, Vladimir Malakhov
- Marie-France Dubreuil, Mathieu Dandenault
- Jessica Dube, Brian Savage
- Sinead Kerr, Grant Marshall
- Mike Krushelnyski, Marcy Hinzmann
- Amanda Evora, Scott Thornton
- Violetta Afanasieva, Jason Strudwick
- Shae-Lynn Bourne, Anson Carter

This episode aired on CBC HD on Sep 22, 2013. The file is substantially larger than normal to achieve reasonable video quality. The quality is something like A8 V8 since it was encoded from an analog source.  

CBC has a big website for this show at http://www.cbc.ca/battle/
